snippet.title: Borderlands 3 Teaser Trailer - Mask of Mayhem
snippet.description:
Mayhem is coming! Watch the Borderlands 3 Reveal Trailer: https://youtu.be/d9Gu1PspA3Y

See the first ever Borderlands 3 gameplay at our May 1 Gameplay Reveal Event! Tune in at 10am PDT / 6pm BST at Borderlands.com.

Music: “Fools Rhythm” by Two Fingers

Subscribe and follow for more exclusive Borderlands info:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/borderlands
Facebook: https://facebook.com/borderlandsgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Borderlands
Website: https://borderlands.com
